about.p1: MOP (Melbourne Open Data Project) is a capstone project sponsored by Deakin University. Since COVID, there has been an increased demand for data by the business community to support their decision-making.
about.p2: This project aligns with strategic documents from the Melbourne City Council and aims to provide insightful data solutions.

mop_full_form.response: Melbourne Open Data Project (MOP) is a capstone project sponsored by Deakin University. Since COVID, there has been an increased demand for data by the business community to support their decision-making. This project is meant to align with two strategic documents from the Melbourne City Council.

project_overview.response: This project provides access to open data about Melbourne, enabling analysis of urban challenges and opportunities.

contact.response: You can contact us via our Contact Us page or email us at info@melbourneopendata.org.

help.response: How can I assist you? You can ask about the project, use cases, navigation, or any other information you need.

use_cases.intro: Here are some relevant case studies:

use_case_prompt.response: We didn't find that use case. Could you please provide more details: Title, Description, and Tags?

initial.welcome: Hi, How can I help you? Check out our

disability_services.title: Disability Services and Public Transport Analysis within CBD
disability_services.description: This use case provides an analysis and visualization into public transport and footpaths for disabled users.

return_to_office.title: Flexible Return To Office Options
return_to_office.description: The City Of Melbourne Council is looking for ideas to bring people back into the city post COVID.

urban_heat_island.title: Urban Heat Island Effect Reduction
urban_heat_island.description: This use case aims to deliver a tool for Melbourne city planners to explore possible areas of greening.

live_events.title: Live Events and the Effect on Foot Traffic and Business
live_events.description: Tracking how live events affect foot traffic and the resulting impact on local business.

tourist_activity.title: Business & Activity â€“ Supporting Local Businesses Surrounding Tourist Attractions
tourist_activity.description: In Melbourne, our strategic approach to enhancing the tourist experience involves utilizing curated data.

population_growth.title: Small Area Population Growth Active Transport
population_growth.description: Identify key areas where active transportation routes could experience higher demand.

green_roof.title: Ideal Green Roof Locations
green_roof.description: Create a visual map incorporating GIS to assess which areas of Melbourne are suitable for green roof retrofits.

smart_bin.title: Smart Bin Waste Collection AI Application T2 2023
smart_bin.description: Examined the benefit of introducing smart bins around the City of Melbourne and investigated their use.

tree_canopy.title: Tree Canopy Changes
tree_canopy.description: Study the effect on development activity on nearby trees.
